attributes.action: Stop the epidemic of road humps and narrowings, and use the tarmac to fill in the thousands of potholes instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been an epidemic in the number of traffic "calmings" in recent years. Everyone understands the need for speed restrictions in certain places, but the councils have gone beserk in the amount of money that is spent on these measures. A lot of the time they just create more frustration for the already stressed out motorists. This money and effort would be better spent on filling in the thousands of potholes that are affectig our crumbling roads
